summary: During the Civil War, Mexican cattleman Alvarez Kelly supplies the Union with cattle until Confederate Colonel Tom Rossiter's hungry men force Kelly to change his customers.
cast: William Holden|Richard Widmark|Janice Rule|Patrick O'Neal|Victoria Shaw|Roger C.
